title: Conduct Lease Due Diligence
description: During a property acquisition, an agent must perform due diligence by abstracting all tenant leases.

tasks.description: Obtain copies of all current lease agreements for the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all necessary lease documents.

tasks.description: For each lease, extract and summarize key terms: tenant name, lease start/end dates, rent amount, renewal options, and expense responsibilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a structured summary (lease abstract) for each tenant.

tasks.description: Compare the lease abstracts to the seller's rent roll to identify any discrepancies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and flags inconsistencies between the leases and the rent roll for further investigation.
